messages.messageBody:
-----Original Message-----
From: Pam Hartley <pamhartley@...>

Hello all :)

Some of you will remember me (I was not King of the Gordok Ogres then) - Pam
Hartley, unschooling mom in California. I have been a long time away from
this list (and my other unschooling haunts) but I'm trying to pop in a
little more often, chat a little more frequently :), and see you all a
little more consistently!

-=-=-=-

Hi, Pam! I'm sooo glad to see you're back! I've missed you!!!

~KellyKelly LovejoyConference CoordinatorLive and Learn Unschooling Conferencehttp://liveandlearnconference.org

messages.subject: I am King of the Gordok Ogres!
messages.msgSnippet: Hello all :) Some of you will remember me (I was not King of the Gordok Ogres then) - Pam Hartley, unschooling mom in California. I have been a long time away
messages.messageBody:
Hello all :)

Some of you will remember me (I was not King of the Gordok Ogres then) - Pam
Hartley, unschooling mom in California. I have been a long time away from
this list (and my other unschooling haunts) but I'm trying to pop in a
little more often, chat a little more frequently :), and see you all a
little more consistently!

Brief update, boring to everyone but especially those who have NO idea who
the heck I am: Wally is great, about to be hired by our local police
department full time as the animal control officer (increased pay, medical
benefits after 7 years flying without them, I'm pretty happy); I am great,
working in the family tax and accounting business (2 minutes from my house,
flexible hours, music of impending doom in my head since Tax Season is just
around the corner) training dogs and selling books on the side; Brit and
Mikey are great, now 11 and 8, still unschooling happily.

This is my favorite time of year, the Christmas tree goes up tomorrow, and I
start baking every day.

I'll catch up with the conversations and post meat and potatoes stuff as it
seems appropriate, but wanted to say "hi!" first.

Pam

P.S. Obscure World of Warcraft gaming reference in title for those in the
know. ;) Our entire family of four is highly involved in the game. If you're
on Dragonblight server, send a tell to Cassilda sometime!


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
